item.title: Modeling Others' Minds as Code
item.description: arXiv:2510.01272v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Accurate prediction of human behavior is essential for robust and safe human-AI collaboration. However, existing approaches for modeling people are often data-hungry and brittle because they either make unrealistic assumptions about rationality or are...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> API, large language model, reasoning, LLM, arxiv | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
